rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that sets the tone for a farmhouse aesthetic, with ample natural lighting and traditional Indian design elements. Vastu principles are observed by placing this room in the north-east direction to welcome positive energy.

Open-plan living area with integrated kitchen. Designed for modern lifestyle and farmhouse charm, featuring large windows for natural light. Vastu principles suggest placing this space in the east or south to enhance social interactions.
Open-plan kitchen integrated with living area. Equipped with modern appliances and farmhouse style finishes, located in the southeast zone for auspicious energy.
Luxurious master bedroom with private balcony. Designed with premium finishes and ample storage, positioned in the southwest zone as per Vastu guidelines to promote relaxation.
Cozy secondary bedroom designed for privacy and comfort. Incorporates subtle farmhouse design elements. Placed in the north zone to encourage clarity and positivity.
Modern bathroom adjoining master bedroom. Designed for functionality with farmhouse aesthetics. Vastu compliant placement in the west zone is considered.
Dedicated library space with built-in bookshelves and comfortable seating. Designed for quiet study and reading, placed in the north zone to enhance intellectual energy.
Compact private gym area integrated with wellness space. Designed for functionality and flexibility, placed in the south-west zone following Vastu guidelines.
A dedicated study area with ample natural light, designed for concentration and productivity. Vastu suggests placing this in the north zone to enhance clarity.
Additional storage space for farmhouse essentials. Designed to be functional and blend with the overall aesthetic, placed in the west zone.
A cozy dining area that complements the open living space, designed to foster social interactions. Placed in the south zone as per Vastu principles.

openings.description: Large, inviting entrance door with farmhouse aesthetic. Positioned in the north-east zone as per Vastu guidelines.
Large windows to enhance natural light in the living area. Placed strategically on the east side.
Functional windows for kitchen ventilation and light, positioned in the southeast direction.
Balcony window providing an outdoor view and ventilation for the master bedroom, positioned in the southwest.
Window designed to let natural light into the library, positioned on the north side.
